title: life_experience
author: life_experience
content: In your opinion, can the capitalization of the entire cryptocurrency market exceed 10 trillion or more in 2025?

comments.author: BlaBlaGame.io
comments.body: $5-7T if the current pace of mass adoption will be kept. I think Binance will be getting more licenses in different jurisdictions which will enable people get in crypto easier.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: It is quite possible. The capitalization of cryptocurrencies, like the price of bitcoin, is always historically rising. This is part of the crypto-adoption. The industry attracts more and more people and more and more money. So 10 trillion, that is a 300% increase over ATH capitalization in 2021 is a reasonable increase, given that capitalization has quadrupled in the last cycle.

comments.author: btc_angela
comments.body: Quote from: Xal0lex on May 14, 2022, 07:34:55 PMIt is quite possible. The capitalization of cryptocurrencies, like the price of bitcoin, is always historically rising. This is part of the crypto-adoption. The industry attracts more and more people and more and more money. So 10 trillion, that is a 300% increase over ATH capitalization in 2021 is a reasonable increase, given that capitalization has quadrupled in the last cycle.Yeah, I think I will also go with this numbers as well, so maybe around $10 Trillion will be a safe bet if you are going to look at the past and extrapolate the data to predict the future.It's just the question as to where the money will come from. I also asked the same before, when we are breaking ATH at least for BTC in reaching $50k-$60k, it was institutional investors and then governments. So who will be the next one? billionaires? gold bugs who will totally shift their assets to BTC? or will it come from retail investors as we might see adoption growing in the next 4-5 years?

comments.author: makishart
comments.body: Quote from: life_experience on May 14, 2022, 06:45:11 PMIn your opinion, can the capitalization of the entire cryptocurrency market exceed 10 trillion or more in 2025?It's too good to be true my friend. It's not even surpassing 3 trillions and how it possible for crypto to surpass 10 trillions in the next years. Remember the bearish trend can also be a very long time like this can recovers in years later. In my opinion even at that time we have done another bitcoin halving and this can't change the market capitalization drastically. It needs sometime to make sure people are feeling confidence with the market and they can FOMO to pump bitcoin.

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: Quote from: BlaBlaGame.io on May 14, 2022, 07:00:32 PM$5-7T if the current pace of mass adoption will be kept. I think Binance will be getting more licenses in different jurisdictions which will enable people get in crypto easier.  Now that many local exchanges have reached out to newcomers, I don't think Binance will play a significant role in boosting market capitalization. And I don't understand which adoption you are talking about, in fact mass adoption has not reached 50% of financial services worldwide (not including banking).Likewise with new projects, although with big ambitions, they have not been fully implemented in the real world as written in their WP.

comments.author: Tony116
comments.body: Quote from: Xal0lex on May 14, 2022, 07:34:55 PMIt is quite possible. The capitalization of cryptocurrencies, like the price of bitcoin, is always historically rising. This is part of the crypto-adoption. The industry attracts more and more people and more and more money. So 10 trillion, that is a 300% increase over ATH capitalization in 2021 is a reasonable increase, given that capitalization has quadrupled in the last cycle.If 2025 is a strong bull then the market cap will definitely increase but 10 trillion is a pretty big number. The current market capitalization is 1.3 trillion, which means that by 2025 the capitalization will be 7 times higher than it is now. That is not feasible. Now we are in a bearish and we still don't know how long it will last and how far the market will fall. If bear season lasts, they will take years to recover and grow. I predict 3 trillion for 2025, 3 times the current capitalization.

comments.author: death69
comments.body: A simple analysis on a log scale. I believe that 10 trillion is possible. The cryptocurrency total market cap has expanded exponentially over the last 10 years so I expect everything will be much slower in the next 4 years cycles If you do not know which coin to buy, just throw everything you have in Bitcoin. No matter how worse the situation may be, Bitcoin will perpetually increase.

comments.author: TastyChillySauce00
comments.body: I will be only thinking about the bitcoin will doubled its ATH rather than think if crypto market will reach 10 trillions marketcap in the next years. Some people like above me may able tp give his prediction through creating the line but again the market will decide its future. We have not yet seen bitcoin to touch 100 USD and im sure that once bitcoin will reach 80k and there will always be a correction like this. The chance to be doubled will always there but expecting the crypto market to worth 10 trillions are too big and it's too good to be true from a few years from now.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Quote from: Tony116 on May 15, 2022, 12:29:53 AMQuote from: Xal0lex on May 14, 2022, 07:34:55 PMIt is quite possible. The capitalization of cryptocurrencies, like the price of bitcoin, is always historically rising. This is part of the crypto-adoption. The industry attracts more and more people and more and more money. So 10 trillion, that is a 300% increase over ATH capitalization in 2021 is a reasonable increase, given that capitalization has quadrupled in the last cycle.If 2025 is a strong bull then the market cap will definitely increase but 10 trillion is a pretty big number. The current market capitalization is 1.3 trillion, which means that by 2025 the capitalization will be 7 times higher than it is now. That is not feasible. Now we are in a bearish and we still don't know how long it will last and how far the market will fall. If bear season lasts, they will take years to recover and grow. I predict 3 trillion for 2025, 3 times the current capitalization.You are counting the capitalization from the current decline to the supposed maximum, so it seems unlikely to you, because the difference is too big, about 7 times. But I want to remind you, if you take that same year 2020, the capitalization was about 370-400 billion in the middle of the year. In 2021, the capitalization has increased 9 times, so an increase from current levels of 7 times does not seem anything unlikely, especially considering that there are 3 more years of development and acceptance of the crypto industry ahead.

comments.author: Kunnu
comments.body: There are higher possibilities to increase crypto currency market capitalization in upcoming years. As we know crypto currency investments have been very profitable option so far for many people according to my estimate the numbers of crypto currency investors will keep increasing time to time which will obviously leave a positive impact on the adoption graph of crypto currencies so on this basis we may see a decent growth in market capitalization of crypto.

comments.author: Gayong88
comments.body: There are many things that keep me optimistic about the future of cryptocurrencies. I personally think that the Crypto market will explode once the normal market returns. I don't think there's any way to know for sure what's going to happen in the future and no one can predict it so far it's just predictions from analysis because it's always changing, but there seems to be a lot of value here. It is possible that the market capitalization will reach 10 x of the current Market Cap in next years 2025, or even exceed that amount.

comments.author: Sterbens
comments.body: Quote from: life_experience on May 14, 2022, 06:45:11 PMIn your opinion, can the capitalization of the entire cryptocurrency market exceed 10 trillion or more in 2025?2025 means we have passed Bitcoin ATH for the umpteenth time. Of course, the positive impact will also be felt on other altcoins. Where market capitalists develop more rapidly and massively. I'm sure it won't be too difficult in the next 2 or 3 years. It could even exceed what we listed. The development of the cryptocurrency market which is currently being intensively made has become an option for people to save their finances in crypto. Therefore, speaking of market capitalists above 10 trillion can be realized.

comments.author: Jackl87
comments.body: Quote from: life_experience on May 14, 2022, 06:45:11 PMIn your opinion, can the capitalization of the entire cryptocurrency market exceed 10 trillion or more in 2025?To be honest i have no idea as i think that the whole crypto market is extremely hard to predict and i also think that the market can still be manipulated by big whales. At the moment the total market cap according to coinmarketcap.com is 1,27 trillion USD. So i personally think that maybe around 5 trillion at the end of 2025 are possible if the surrounding conditions are positive and in favor of the crypto market. I also think though that it is possible that we stay at the same level as we are now for a few more years. If the federal banks keep on increasing the interests rate again then maybe a lot of  capital will flow back from cryptos to traditional bank products.

comments.author: tygeade
comments.body: Quote from: Gayong88 on May 16, 2022, 08:08:43 AMThere are many things that keep me optimistic about the future of cryptocurrencies. I personally think that the Crypto market will explode once the normal market returns. I don't think there's any way to know for sure what's going to happen in the future and no one can predict it so far it's just predictions from analysis because it's always changing, but there seems to be a lot of value here. It is possible that the market capitalization will reach 10 x of the current Market Cap in next years 2025, or even exceed that amount.It is definitely possible to hit 10x, especially when you consider that we are not that high right now. I mean even if we look at just bitcoin, which is a great indicator anyway, we are at around 30k levels so far, being 300k in 2025 wouldn't be a shock to anyone.That is why I love bitcoin so much, we are in a situation where it is clear to me why people are moving towards bitcoin more rapidly compared to past, since the idea of "bitcoin always recovers and goes up" finally started to hit people. When you realize that, even if we are down right now, 300k still doesn't seem too unlikely for any of us, we all think that it is quite possible.

comments.author: TastyChillySauce00
comments.body: Quote from: life_experience on May 14, 2022, 06:45:11 PMIn your opinion, can the capitalization of the entire cryptocurrency market exceed 10 trillion or more in 2025?Expecting the marketcap of crypto to be doubled from its all time high marketcapitalization was more than enough. It's around 4 trillion and if you are expecting more from than this and yeah keep it in your dream. It's not a game that you can drastically pump the marketcapitalization. It's better to think rationally based on the fact rather than keep dreaming with your wish that will never come true until the next decade. im not even sure if we will be seeing this will be reached in the next decade as well. Just wanna to tell you about the truth

comments.author: Digital_Lord
comments.body: In my opinion if Bitcoin gain more popularity and people start investing in Bitcoin also  Bitcoin adoption is spread all over the world and many Countries adopted Bitcoin as a legal tender then it's easily possible. In my opinion Bitcoin has very bright future and this target is possible to get achieved.

comments.author: tazmantasik
comments.body: Depending with bitcoin price, if keep down can't speculative raise 10 trillion or more in 2025 because many investor leaving cryptocurrency, have got bad experience last weeks when Luna coin drop and I think many investor frustrated and leaving cryptocurrency right now as investment assets. But if bitcoin still can reach higher price have potential raise 10 trillion in 2025. Not sure about how much transaction raise because bitcoin drop again every day, up few percent early morning and night back to lower price and take few weeks later for reach higher price.
